conversation.message: We are happy to provide detailed insight into our daily structure. Our typical routine balances structured learning with child-led exploration. The mornings focus on foundational skills and curriculum blocks (literacy/numeracy), followed by a substantial period dedicated to collaborative play and creative arts. Crucially, outdoor play and nature integration are cornerstones of our program; we allocate a minimum of 90 minutes daily for outdoor activities, utilizing our natural playground and sensory garden. Furthermore, every week includes a dedicated 'Nature Day' where learning is entirely outdoors, focusing on environmental science, observation, and physical development. We believe this robust integration fosters holistic development. We hope this further clarifies our educational environment.
